fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Untransport 2 players at night. Any effects that would cause visitors to these players to be redirected into another player silently fail. These 2 players are redirected into each other through immunity

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Immunity to effects that would cause your target to change
- This role is mechanically a town role in every way except win condition

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See the good faction lose (may win while dead)
